backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based romantic pink theme definitions with light/dark variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Valentine branding, meta tags, and root mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component that centers and renders the ValentinePrompt.
Interactive Valentine prompt with evasive No button and success view on Yes click.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized constants for Valentine text, messages, and metadata.
frontend/src/config/publicSiteUrl.ts: Empty public site URL config file.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks managing Internet Identity authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for a romantic pink/white theme with light/dark modes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, and imports global styles.
frontend/src/utils/appMetadata.ts: Empty placeholder utility file for app metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, romantic theme extensions, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s goals and requirements for a romantic Valentine web page with Yes/No behavior and meme handling.
